text: Kunyangwe avo vasingatendi pakati pevanhu vakapihwa Mabhuku (maJudha nemaKristu) kana Al-Mushrikoon (Vanonamata zviumbwa ne avo vasingatendi muhumwechete hwaAllah), havadi kuti zvakanaka zvitumirwe kwamuri kubva kuna Tenzi venyu (Allah). Asi Allah vanosarudza kupa tsitsi dzavo kune avo vavanoda. Allah ndivo muridzi wemakomborero makuru
